A lot of people feel the same way. Now, your specific thoughts might be unique, but the fact that you ruminate and philosophize is not unique at all. At the end of the day its really not necessary wether or not people understand your exact ruminations because a lot of it can be summed up as conventional knowledge/wisdom and a lot of it is just bullshit projections.

If you want to be validated for your thoughts, write a book, start a blog, become a singer/songwriter.... unless youre happy with say a single person like a therapist giving you that validation. Its funny how all these accomplished geniuses have existed throughout history yet we still feel like were special
